column4: anyone installed ut2004? i cant get it installed, it asks me to put disk two in, i cant unmount to put it in, and if i force unmount it the installer doesnt recognize disk two when its mounted .. ?
can you copy the files off each cd into the proper folders?
what folders though? how do i know where its installing everything to?
I'd say check the folder on the cd, copy it directly to the same folder in whereever ut2004 installs
